about_the_game:
"Atlantis Heroes - Rise of the Lost Land" immerses players in a post-apocalyptic realm where they embody enslaved heroes striving to overthrow their oppressors and restore Atlantis to its former glory. Through customizable avatars and transformative hero abilities, players navigate treacherous landscapes, engage in intense gladiatorial battles, and forge alliances to reclaim their freedom. The game features a rich narrative intertwining quests assigned by powerful bosses, gang battles for territorial dominance, and diverse match types offering thrilling combat experiences. As players progress, they can unlock new abilities, construct dens, and participate in special events, ensuring a dynamic and immersive gaming experience across PC, console, and mobile platforms.

Key features include a comprehensive monetization system offering loot boxes, in-game currency, and exclusive cosmetic items for purchase, enhancing player customization and progression. The inclusion of a trading center fosters community interaction, allowing players to exchange resources and forge alliances. With regular updates introducing fresh content and gameplay enhancements, "Atlantis Heroes" promises endless hours of adventure, strategy, and camaraderie in the quest to revive Atlantis and overthrow tyranny in the lost land.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-XXXX / AMD Ryzen 5 XXXX or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A high-speed internet connection is required for online multiplayer. Integrated graphics may not run the game smoothly; a dedicated graphics card is recommended.
